overview: Suburbia can be such a quiet, sedate, and tranquil place. Some might say boring. But in this restrictive enclave exists a hidden world of dark and perverted fantasies, deviant desires, and primal urges rule the bedroom of these safe and protected communities, and when one enterprising mom discovers the untapped market of horny and unsatisfied married couples, she helps introduce the world to the untapped libidos of the Latex Moms.
title: Latex Moms
